title: Dua in jumaah
transcript: question what about Dua in after Salah should we do it well this was not done by the propham nor by the companions may Allah be pleased with them and the way it's done as in the case of turkey Syria Jordan some place uh some places in um I think Egypt uh I think in in the Indian subcontinent they still have it all of these places there not following the Sunnah because they don't have uh any proof to prove that the prophet or the companion uh have ever done this therefore it is an innovation and one should not do this and Allah Knows Best
